data.name: AMS-III.F. | BOLD Carbon (CH₄) - SSC
data.description: Certifies methane emissions prevented through organic waste composting using UNFCCC AMS-III.F methodology. Tracks complete chain of custody from waste generation through professional composting to quantify CO₂e emissions reductions. This methodology provides a comprehensive framework for measuring, reporting, and verifying the environmental benefits of diverting organic waste from landfills to composting facilities.

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates that each MassID is unique within the system to prevent duplicate entries
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Waste Mass is Unique

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies that the MassID has not been previously registered in other carbon certificates or carbon credits
mass_id_audit_rules.name: No Conflicting GasID or Credit

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms that the MassID processing occurred within the valid project timeframe
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Project Period Limit

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Checks if all participating entities have valid certifications and permissions
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Participant Accreditations Requirements

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the proper categorization and definition of the organic waste mass
mass_id_audit_rules.name: MassID Qualifications

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Ensures the waste is properly classified according to local regulations and standards
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Regional Waste Classification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the accuracy of geographical coordinates for waste collection and processing locations
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Geolocation and Address Precision

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the documented source and origin point of the organic waste
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Waste Origin Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the identity and credentials of the waste transportation company
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Hauler Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the registration and compliance of vehicles used in waste transportation
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Vehicle Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the identity and proper licensing of the waste transport driver
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Driver Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Checks the completeness and accuracy of waste transportation documentation
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Transport Manifest Data

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the identity and certification of the waste processing facility
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Processor Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the identity and credentials of the recycling facility operator
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Recycler Identification

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the accurate measurement and recording of waste MassID quantities
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Weighing

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates the proper reception and documentation of waste at the recycling facility
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Drop-off at Recycler

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Confirms the proper segregation and classification of organic waste materials
mass_id_audit_rules.name: MassID Sorting

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validates that the composting process follows required duration and conditions
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Composting Cycle Timeframe

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Verifies the completion and accuracy of final recycling documentation and outcomes
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Recycling Manifest Data

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Validate if the MassID is in accordance with the project boundary
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Project Boundary

mass_id_audit_rules.description: Calculate the prevented CO₂e based on the Emission Factor and the MassID value
mass_id_audit_rules.name: Prevented CO₂e
